name: Branch Manager
info: Supermarket Strategy Development and Implementation  Ensure implementation of MAF Retailâ€™s supermarket plans in line with the supermarket strategies and procedures in collaboration with the Head Office and Corporate Office Commercial Performance  Apply qualitative and quantitative analysis to measure and evaluate commercial performance, and provide recommendations to increase profitability and sales turnover Maximize sales and profitability by controlling costs within the budgetary guidelines Identify internal and external opportunities for the supermarket to enhance and optimize commercial performance Initiate and ensure application of comparative studies between departments that can contribute to the efficiency of the commercial performance

name: Mathematics Teacher
info: We are looking to hire a math teacher with Mathematics educational background from 3-7 years of experience, Preferably with e-learning experience to work in an educational company.

name: Web Designer
info: Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off to engineering Conceptualize original website design ideas that bring simplicity and user-friendliness to complex roadblocks Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to communicate interaction and design ideas Present and defend designs and key deliverables to peers and executive level stakeholders Establish and promote design guidelines, best practices, and standards Gather and evaluate user requirements in collaboration with product managers and engineers. Identify and troubleshoot UX problems (e.g. responsiveness). Determine the message the design should portray Develop graphics for product illustrations, logos, and websites Talent in creating multimedia items Comfortable in a fast-paced, demanding environment Ability to work well with others and contribute to a team environment Ability to interact effectively with people at every level of the organization

name: NPO (Pharmaceuticals)
info:
Contribute to the planning, formulation, implementation, monitoring and evaluation of the medical supply chain activities and stock management.
Contribute to the strengthening of the regulatory system of medical products and implementation of good regulatory practices through provision of technical assistance and capacity building
Collaborate with the WHO team and MoH on quality control and assurance systems for procurement, supply chain management, distribution and storage, including cold storage of medical products and issues related to access of quality-assured medical products, market intelligence, pricing and the appropriate use of medical products at the various health care levels.
Provide technical insight for the upgrading and automation of the warehouse management capacity at the central and peripheral level.
Develop and update the national essential medicines list for the country.
Collaborate with other colleagues at the WCO to conduct national capacity building activities in the area of regulation of medical products including pharmacovigilance and supply chain management of medical products including procurement systems
Recommend ways to improve medical device management in health care facilities, in compliance with WHO standards and guiding documents.
Coordinate the publishing and dissemination of information, documents and guidelines on best practices and coordinated efforts pertaining to the various technical activities.

name: Regional Medical Advisor, Jordan
info:
As the Regional Medical Advisor your main responsibility will be to build and maintain scientific understanding of Novo Nordisk products in Jordan; share up-to-date medical knowledge and clinical trial data with internal and external stakeholders; leverage scientific and clinical expertise to create relationships with the Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs) and Healthcare Professionals (HCPs), to ensure the correct positioning of the companyâ€™s portfolio.

One of your responsibilities will be to keep our internal stakeholders trained and up to date in relation to our focus therapy areas and to the companyâ€™s products, and to lead medical events/initiatives beside full responsibility on the medical content for symposia/meetings for health care providers.

name: Officer - Production
info:
Enter data received from the Participated Insurance Companies (PICs) in relation to enrollments and endorsements to MedNext system.

Prepare documents such as Policy Wordings, Beneficiary Userâ€™s Guide, Policy Schedules and Request Forms accurately.
Respond to business queries from PICs / Clients effectively and efficiently.
Provides excellent customer service to the PICâ€™s with a view to achieve maximum client satisfaction.
Update operational departments such as Claims, Network, MCC departments on Policy adjustments, Cancellations, Refunds, and Renewals.
Dispatch documents for relevant PIC/ client and maintain a dispatch register for information.
Dispatch and assure scanning and entering all required documents on the archiving system.

name: Accountant
info:
Bookkeeping including the recording, storing and retrieving of financial transactions.

name: Marketing and sales representative
info: A BA in Electrical Engineering. Four years of low current systems experience in marketing and sales. Must be knowledgeable in marketing concepts and people management. Must be skilled in sales planning, client relationships and creative services. Also candidate are required to be very well in Business English (writing, speaking, and reading).

name: Graphic Designer
info: We are seeking to hire a professional who has an eye for detail, knows how to provide high-quality of designing skills and is able to work in a team. You should be a person who always seeks improvement, knows how to deliver results and values excellence.

name: Project Manager
info: The purpose of the Project Manager (PM) position is to provide overall leadership and coordination for ensuring the implementation and accomplishment of the objectives of the Program under his/her responsibility in line with CARE Jordan vision, goals, and program principles, standards, approaches and Strategic Plan. In consultation with the supervisor and in collaboration with the Program staff she/he develops annual implementation plans and budget, allocates appropriate resources to accomplish the plan, secures qualified staff and ensures that an appropriate monitoring system is in place to track progress and deviations of Program implementation. To promote the highest level of staff performance the PM ensures that all supervisors provide coaching and counseling to the Program staff. He/she establishes and maintains effective working relationships with key government partners and NGOs working in the same areas.

name: Driver
info:
As a Driver, you are supporting the program activities by facilitating transportation, security and
administrative services during the implementation period. Duties include transport of people and
goods efficiently on a timely manner and arranging regular cleaning and maintenance services for
the vehicle(s)

name: Clinical Nurse
info: The nurse is responsible for patient preparation, as well as, assisting the physician with medical procedures. Also performs various diagnostic tests, administration of medications, and patient education in the clinic. Maintains equipment and acts as a liaison between the physician and all outside agencies to include hospitals, pharmacies, laboratories and other physician's offices, as well as, with the patient. The nurse supports other medical staff members to maintain patient flow. Also maintains accurate and complete documentation.

name: Field Coordinator
info:
Join and be part of a global relief, development and advocacy NGO, dedicated to work with children, families & communities to overcome poverty and injustice. World Vision International was established in 1950 & operates in nearly 100 countries worldwide.
World Vision is committed to the protection of children and we do not employ people whose background is not suitable for working with children. All employment is conditioned upon the successful completion of all applicable background checks, including criminal record checks where possible.

Position: Field Coordinator

If you are Jordanian and meet our requirements, please submit your resume with a covering letter via below website, only applications submitted via our website are accepted

https://careers.wvi.org/jobs/jordan/food-security-and-livelihood/field-coordinator/14331

name: Quality Assurance Manager
info:
Basic Qualifications
â€¢ Bachelor's or Master's in CS or related field with over 7 years of experience software quality assurance and at least 2+ years in a QA Manager/lead role
â€¢ Strong QA background with experience in identifying and reviewing test plans, test cases and testing results.
â€¢ Knowledge of scripting languages such as SQL, Perl, Python, XML or Ruby
â€¢ Proficient in Object oriented programming and ability to write code in C, C++ or Java
â€¢ Highly effective at working with geographically distributed QA, business and development teams.
â€¢ Strong people management skills with a proven track record in hiring, developing and retaining high performing QA team consisting of QAEs and SDETs.
â€¢ Strong project management skills, preferably with experience in an agile development environment.
â€¢ Proven track record in identifying and implementing automated testing tools and frameworks.
â€¢ Excellent quality and release management skills.
â€¢ Established track record for delivering high quality products.
â€¢ Demonstrated ability to define and present metrics that help illuminate our quality and quality goals.

Familiarity with a wide range of field practices, concepts, and procedures. Marketing specialists rely on judgment in planning and experience to accomplish identified goals.

name: DevOps Engineer
info: We are looking for smart, passionate and motivated DevOps Engineer to join our growing team at Jawaker. Regardless of how many years of experience you have, we are mainly looking for people with the right attitude to learn rather than people with the knowledge.

name: User Acquisition Specialist
info:
Job Description

The User Acquisition Specialist (UAS) will help drive user growth and maximize advertising Return on Investment (RoI). The UAS will design, implement and track acquisition campaigns to drive new players to our products on ad networks, social media platforms, and various other channels.

The UAS will collaborate with remote creative and marketing people to optimize creativity, messages, and budgets and develop compelling advertising campaigns. The UAS will also develop A/B testing programs to maximize acquisition efforts and return.

The UAS will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data across all UA operations to support the overall marketing strategy and work with the management team to develop insights, advice on the implementation of analytic solutions and analyze data to optimize campaigns that meet volume and RoI targets.

name: Technical Support
